## SpinnerModel.tick() method

Command to start/continue the spinner animation. Call this in your model's init() or after handling a TickMsg.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tick(): Cmd<TickMsg>;
```
**Returns:**

[Cmd](./tea.cmd.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TickMsg](./spinner.tickmsg.md)<!-- -->&gt;
